A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: On the plus side: good performances from Driver and Ridley\, Hamill finally gets to do some real acting (AND over-acting\, but\, hell\, he's been waiting for like ages to do this...). There were some good-to-grat actions scenes\, and I liked some of the choices Johnson made\, trying to subvert expectaions\, BUT!! Anything aside from the Rey-Ren-Luke storylines felt like filler (and mostly bad filler\, at that). The Force Awakens set the new trilogy on track to more-or-less replay the original one\, and this just feels old and tired and completely unnecessary. I will NOT be coming back for the \"final\" chapter.
